title: Google\Cloud\DataFusion\V1\ListInstancesRequest
name: ListInstancesRequest
description:
Request message for listing Data Fusion instances.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datafusion.v1.ListInstancesRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The project and location for which to retrieve instance information in the format projects/{project}/locations/{location}. If the location is specified as '-' (wildcard), then all regions available to the project are queried, and the results are aggregated.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: The maximum number of items to return.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: The next_page_token value to use if there are additional results to retrieve for this list request.

params.name: data.order_by
params.description: Sort results. Supported values are "name", "name desc", or "" (unsorted).
